If I reject, I will make an offer next round. My money will be worth 10% less than the initial amount. Bob is clearly aiming to take a large portion and likely will continue to offer me a small sum in subsequent rounds.

Value to Alice = $4500 * (1 - 0.05) = $4500 * 0.95 = $4275
